mainHeaderSection.heading: Point of Sale
mainHeaderSection.maintitle: Our Best POS Software Built for Smart Retail Decisions
mainHeaderSection.description: Managing sales shouldn't be complicated. Tech Cloud ERP's Point of Sale system is designed to make transactions seamless and efficient, whether you're running a small retail shop, restaurant, or a growing chain of outlets. With real-time insights and intuitive features, you can focus more on your customers and less on the backend.

featureSections.featuretitle: Set Up and Customize your POS
featureSections.featuredesc: Tech Cloud ERP allows you to personalize the POS to your needs. It can be configured to fit your business set-up whether you are using at a cafe or a traditional set-up in your boutique. Configure product groups, establish pricing and manual or automatic payment methods to meet your business set-up.

Processing your sales is easy and fast after you initially setup. Simply scan the items, apply discounts, payment methods, etc. The system also automatically updates your inventory in real-time, providing you with accurate stock levels. This all-in-one system will help you avoid stockouts and over-stockings and keep your business running smoothly.

featureSections.featuretitle: Analyze Performance and Grow your Business
featureSections.featuredesc: Make smarter business decisions with powerful analytics. Tech Cloud ERP's POS module generates detailed daily reports, helping you identify top-performing products, peak sales hours, and key customer trends. With these actionable insights, you can refine promotions, optimize inventory planning, and fuel your business growth strategically.

videosection.title: Faster Billing, Happier Customers
videosection.description: Quick billing, accurate stock sync and customer data — all in one view. Our POS system supports fast-paced retail environments with smooth, reliable performance.

faqs.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.title: Everything You Need to Know About Our POS Solution

items.question: How does the POS module handle sales and inventory?
items.answer: The POS module records customer purchases, updates stock levels instantly and helps in preventing overselling. It combines checkout operations with real-time inventory tracking—so you can always know what you've sold and what's left.

items.question: What kind of hardware and payment methods are supported?
items.answer: It supports a variety of devices—touchscreen terminals, barcode scanners, receipt printers—as well as multiple payment options like card, cash and contactless.

items.question: Can I view sales analytics and customer data?
items.answer: Yes, the module offers built-in reports on daily sales, best-selling items and customer purchase patterns. It often includes customer profiles and loyalty tracking to help you understand and retain your buyers.

items.question: What is the POS module in ERP?
items.answer: The Point of Sale (POS) module enables real-time billing, barcode scanning, customer discounts and cashier management at retail counters.
